snippet.title: #BLUD - Official Trailer | gamescom 2023
snippet.description:
Save your friends and fight off the vampire apocalypse in animated dungeon crawler, #BLUD. Reminiscent of a 90s cartoon, #BLUD challenges players to step into the shoes of a high school student and spellcasting vampire hunter, Becky Brewster. Hunt the forces of evil, uncover mysteries, and upgrade your field hockey stick as you rid Carpentersville High of the undead. Check out this #BLUD gamescom 2023 trailer for a look at what to expect when #BLUD arrives on PC via Steam in 2024.

#gamescom
